name: Madness Rush Runner
description:
Madness Rush Runner - Subway & Theme Park Edition amazing runner game 
Run as fast as you can in the Theme Park but take care the park is under construction
so the guard will try to prevents you from entering and will catch you so escape from him!
and gather all the coins you can

Madness Rush Runner - Subway & Theme Park Edition has different places you can enjoy
Subway road , Fish Park , Big Slide , Teleferik , Water World , Rush Race Road and also if you don't fear you can try the Hunted House

In Madness Rush Runner - Subway & Theme Park Edition you can choose from different amazing characters to play with Drag to jump or slide and to move left or right 

Find different and amazing Vehicles you can drive and also you can find the tank , it's can firing and destroy the obstacles , trucks, buses and subway trains

Use skateboard after double tapping, Madness Rush Runner - Subway & Theme Park Edition has unique boards

Collect your daily gift each day and open mystery boxes to get some special rewards and try you luck with lucky wheel to get also amazing rewards 

what are you waiting for? Download it now and start your journey
